author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Salem west district unit of the Congress urged the TNCC high command to take steps to get Omalur and Edappadi Assembly constituencies for the party during the DMK-led alliance seat sharing process.

A resolution adopted at a meeting of the office-bearers of the west district unit of the party said that the party stood good chance of winning in both these constituencies. Hence, the party leadership should press for these seats during the seat sharing talks, the resolution said.

Victory for alliance

Another resolution called upon the party cadre to work tirelessly for the victory of the DMK – Congress alliance in the Assembly elections.
title: Congress seeks Omalur and Edappadi constituencies
